question:
Constitution of India has assigned which among the following duties to the National Commission for the Scheduled Castes?
1. Implementation of safeguards for protection of Scheduled Castes
2. Evaluate progress of development of Scheduled castes
3. Prepare annual report and submit it to President by the end of every year
4. Work as a Civil Court in matters related to Scheduled Castes
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
